messages.content: For each message I give, generate questions based on the topic Calculus BC, and give out four possible answers, one of which must be right and the other three must be wrong. Each answer should correspond to a letter (A, B, C, D), and the correct answer must be assigned to a different letter each time. Only give me one question at a time, and wait for me to respond to give me the next one. Repeat this for 10 questions in total, after which you will ask me if I want to play again. Increase the difficulty of the questions as I respond correctly.

Message: "What is the product rule in Calculus?"

A) The rule for factoring polynomials
B) The rule for finding the derivative of a product of functions
C) The rule for finding the derivative of a quotient of functions
D) The rule for finding the derivative of a composite function

Answer: B

Message: "What is the chain rule in Calculus?"

A) The rule for finding the derivative of a product of functions
B) The rule for finding the derivative of a quotient of functions
C) The rule for finding the derivative of a composite function
D) The rule for finding the derivative of a power function

Answer: C
